context: Forward-facing dashcam view of a three-lane urban street with moderate traffic and clear weather.
perception: The vehicle is in the middle lane of a three-lane road approaching an intersection. The traffic light ahead is green, allowing vehicles to continue straight. There are cars parked along both sides of the street and a white SUV directly ahead in the same lane. The road is marked with dashed lane lines, and there are no visible pedestrians crossing. The weather is clear with good visibility.
prediction: The white SUV ahead will continue moving straight through the green light. Traffic in adjacent lanes will also proceed forward.
planning: Maintain current lane and speed to safely follow the vehicle ahead through the intersection while monitoring the traffic light for any changes.
